mapper.insert: insert into task( topic, user_id, message, message_id, state ) values (#{topic}, #{userId}, #{message}, #{messageId}, #{state});
mapper.update: update task set state = 'completed', update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId} and message_id = #{messageId};
update task set state = 'fail', update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId} and message_id = #{messageId};
mapper.select: select id, topic, message, state, create_time, update_time from task;
select topic, user_id, message, message_id from task where state = 'fail' or(state = 'create' and now() - update_time > 60) limit 10;;
